seniority_level.evidence: Requires minimum 10 years data management experience and 5+ years database design, clearly senior level requirements despite title not containing 'Senior'

job_family.evidence: Primary focus on enterprise data warehouse, dimensional modeling, and database design - core data engineering responsibilities

sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on enterprise data warehouse implementation, Kimball Dimensional Data Modeling, and EDW experience

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions mentoring team members and technical leadership of Oracle data warehouse team, but no direct reports mentioned

primary_cloud.evidence: Mentions Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW) in OCI environment, but also requires experience with Star/Snowflake/Hybrid schemas suggesting multi-cloud familiarity

secondary_clouds.evidence: Snowflake schemas mentioned (typically AWS/Azure) and hybrid schemas suggest multi-cloud experience expected

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL activities, data warehouse implementation, and dimensional modeling suggests batch processing paradigm

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned in job description

storage_layer.evidence: Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse specifically mentioned, plus Star/Snowflake/Hybrid schemas all point to data warehouse focus

remote_restriction.evidence: Must live within 60 miles maximum from Sacramento CA location, hybrid model with 2 days in office required

timezone_focus.evidence: Sacramento CA location with 60-mile radius restriction indicates US-based role

relocation_required.evidence: Must live within 60 miles of Sacramento CA - effectively requires relocation if not already in area

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, and State/Gov experience requirement may indicate security clearance needs

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: 10+ years experience requirement and State/Gov focus suggests not student-visa friendly

citizenship_required.evidence: State/Government experience requirement often implies US citizenship or security clearance needs

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employee position with W2 in title, Chelsoft Solutions Co. appears to be consulting firm providing W2 employees

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, growth opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Very specific experience requirements (10 years data management, 5 years database design, 5 years ER/Studio), multiple mandatory qualifications with exact years specified

scope_definition.evidence: Focused data modeling role with clear responsibilities around enterprise data warehouse, dimensional modeling, and specific technical requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements align well with senior level - 10+ years experience for senior data modeler role is appropriate, skills are relevant and not inflated
